alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Fergus County below 4500ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 18 at 2:05AM MST until December 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, today through Tuesday night very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, Wednesday morning through Thursday morning, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Wear a hat and gloves to prevent frostbite.
